name: 2022 13th International Conference on Environmental Science and Technology
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to ICEST 2022 will be proceeded into academic review by at least 2-3 experts. After acceptation, conference presented and registered full papers of ICEST 2022 will be included in Springer Book Series Environmental Science and Engineering (ISSN: 1863-5520), which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, SCImago and other major databases for indexing.
